hero.subtitle: Automate purchase orders, sales quotes & warehouse transfers with AI agents working 24/7 on your ERP system.

bento.title: Powerful ERP Automation
bento.subtitle: Advanced AI agents designed to automate complex ERP tasks and deliver professional-grade results directly within your system.
bento.poDesc: Auto-creates POs from reorder signals, vendor SLAs, and price lists. Vendor selection with multi-criteria scoring for price, lead time, and reliability.
bento.quoteDesc: Generates customer-ready quotes from requests, emails, or CRM notes. Applies pricing rules, discounts, and availability checks from ERP data.
bento.warehouseDesc: Execute daily stock transfers between locations based on demand patterns, inventory levels, and business rules with full audit trails.
bento.insightsDesc: Retrieve deep insights from your ERP system. Analyze purchasing patterns, vendor performance, and inventory optimization opportunities.

howItWorks.title: Every Agent is Custom-Built
howItWorks.subtitle: Each AI agent is carefully designed and configured to match your specific business processes, data structures, and operational requirements. Our team works closely with you to ensure seamless integration with your existing workflows.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Seamlessly integrate with your existing ERP system. Our agent works with every major ERP system.
howItWorks.step2Desc: We teach the agent your business principles, vendor preferences, and specific operational details by feeding it your historical data and working closely with you. This collaborative approach makes training effortless for your team.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Watch as your ERP processes become faster, more accurate, and completely automated. Focus on growth while we handle the routine tasks.

integrations.title: Integrations Tailored to Your Stack
integrations.subtitle: Our AI agents are custom-built for your specific technology environment. Every integration is carefully configured to match your unique business processes and requirements.
integrations.centerTooltip: ERP Agent - Your AI-powered integration hub
integrations.erpTooltip: ERP Systems - Connect with your business core
integrations.llmTooltip: AI Models - Powered by advanced language processing

ctaSection.title: Ready to Transform Your ERP Operations?
ctaSection.subtitle: Our AI-powered ERP automation has already saved over 40,000 hours of manual work. Book a free consultation to see how we can streamline your business processes and deliver similar results.
ctaSection.benefit2: Custom automation strategy for your business
ctaSection.founderQuote: I personally help every client design their automation strategy. Let's discuss how AI can transform your ERP operations.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Clear structure with no hidden costs. Get started with our proven pricing model designed for growing businesses.
pricing.setupDesc: Covers initial integration, configuration, training, and deployment of your custom AI agent. Everything needed to get you operational.
pricing.monthlyDesc: Ongoing access to your AI agent, infrastructure, updates, support, and continuous optimization. Scale with your business needs.
pricing.contactNote: Pricing varies based on complexity, integrations, and business requirements. Contact us for a detailed quote tailored to your specific needs.

testimonials.title: Reviews from our customers
testimonials.subtitle: Discover what our users have to say about their experience with our platform.
testimonials.purchaserContent: Agent does all the purchase orders perfectly and daily warehouse transfers automatically. Handling 2000+ suppliers has become more accurate and easier than we ever imagined.
testimonials.ceoContent: The value as a whole has been transformational. The insights our ERP agent fetches give us deep analytics on purchasing patterns, vendor performance, and inventory optimization that drive strategic decisions.
testimonials.salesContent: Our sales team has gained 50% efficiency at drafting offers for customers. The agent identifies correct products, prices them accurately, and creates offers in the system. Requests with hundreds of rows that took hours daily from sales personnel - now we handle many more requests daily.

footer.description: ERP Agent helps teams automate complex business processes with AI-powered agents - everything you need for intelligent automation in one place

caseStudy.headline: LVI-WaBeK managed to cut over 20K+ hours yearly only with ERP Agent's automations
caseStudy.intro: LVI-WaBeK, a leading building materials distributor, transformed their operations by implementing ERP Agent's intelligent automation system across their entire procurement and sales workflow.
caseStudy.poDesc: The system now handles 2000+ suppliers automatically, creating purchase orders based on sales velocity, inventory levels, and business rules - eliminating manual errors and saving 12+ hours daily.
caseStudy.quoteDesc: Sales teams now generate complex quotes in minutes instead of hours. The agent identifies correct products, applies pricing rules, and creates professional offers directly in their ERP system.
caseStudy.warehouseDesc: Daily stock transfers between locations happen automatically based on demand patterns and inventory optimization algorithms, reducing stockouts by 45%.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.subtitle: Your data security is our top priority. We maintain the highest standards of data protection and privacy compliance.
security.euHostedDesc: All our infrastructure is hosted in the European Union, ensuring GDPR compliance and data sovereignty.
security.zeroRetentionDesc: We maintain zero-data-retention policies for LLM interactions. Your business data is never stored beyond processing.
security.noTrainingDesc: Your data is never used to train third-party AI models. Your business information stays yours, always.
security.dataControlDesc: Request complete data deletion at any time. You maintain full control over your business data.
security.onPremiseDesc: For organizations with strict security requirements, we offer fully on-premise deployment options. Run ERP Agent entirely within your own infrastructure.

salesQuotePage.description: Turn customer RFQs into professional quotes in minutes, not hours. ERP Agent's AI reads any document format, matches products semantically, and applies your pricing rules automatically.
salesQuotePage.howItWorksTitle: From RFQ to Quote in Minutes
salesQuotePage.howItWorksSubtitle: No more manual product lookups, price calculations, or document formatting. Let AI handle the heavy lifting.
salesQuotePage.step1Desc: Drop in an RFQ document - Excel, PDF, email, or any format. The AI extracts product requirements automatically.
salesQuotePage.step2Desc: Semantic search finds the right products from your catalog, even when customer descriptions don't match exactly.
salesQuotePage.step3Desc: Get a formatted quote with customer-specific pricing. Review, adjust if needed, and send directly from your ERP.
salesQuotePage.feature1Desc: Customers rarely use your exact product names. Our AI understands context and finds the right products even with vague descriptions, part numbers from competitors, or industry jargon.
salesQuotePage.feature1Example: Example: Customer requests "24AWG Cat6 cable, blue, 100m"
salesQuotePage.feature1Result: AI finds: "CAT6-UTP-BL-100 - Category 6 Network Cable Blue 100m"
salesQuotePage.feature2Desc: Automatically apply contract pricing, volume discounts, and customer-specific price lists. No more looking up prices manually or making calculation errors.
salesQuotePage.feature2Result: Applies: Contract prices, Volume discounts, Currency conversion
salesQuotePage.feature3Desc: Accept RFQs in any format your customers send them. Excel spreadsheets, PDF files, email bodies, or even images of handwritten lists.
salesQuotePage.feature4Desc: Real-time inventory checks and supplier lead time estimates included in every quote. Customers get accurate delivery information upfront.
salesQuotePage.feature4Result: Shows: In-stock qty, Expected delivery, Alternative products

purchaseOrderPage.description: Stop spending hours on manual purchase order creation. ERP Agent's AI analyzes your inventory, sales patterns, and supplier data to automatically generate optimized purchase orders.
purchaseOrderPage.problem1: Hours spent analyzing sales data and inventory levels
purchaseOrderPage.problem2: Inconsistent ordering decisions across team members
purchaseOrderPage.problem3: Missed reorder points leading to stockouts
purchaseOrderPage.problem4: Manual data entry errors in purchase orders
purchaseOrderPage.solution1: AI analyzes all data in seconds, not hours
purchaseOrderPage.solution2: Consistent business rules applied to every order
purchaseOrderPage.howItWorksSubtitle: ERP Agent's AI agents work around the clock to optimize your purchasing process.
purchaseOrderPage.step1Desc: Set minimum order values, preferred suppliers, and reorder thresholds.
purchaseOrderPage.step2Desc: The agent analyzes sales velocity, inventory, and transaction history.
purchaseOrderPage.step3Desc: Optimized purchase orders are created based on your business logic.
purchaseOrderPage.step4Desc: Review the draft PO and approve with one click. Done.
purchaseOrderPage.feature1Desc: AI calculates optimal reorder points based on historical sales data, lead times, and seasonal patterns.
purchaseOrderPage.feature2Desc: Automatically select the best supplier based on price, availability, and delivery performance.
purchaseOrderPage.feature3Desc: Set minimum order values, quantity thresholds, and margin requirements for automated enforcement.
purchaseOrderPage.feature4Desc: AI suggests alternative products when items are out of stock or have long lead times.
purchaseOrderPage.feature5Desc: Simply tell the AI what you need: "Create a PO for Samsung, minimum 5000 EUR, skip low-velocity items."
purchaseOrderPage.feature6Desc: Direct integration with Lemonsoft, NetSuite, SAP, and other wholesale distribution ERP systems.

wholesaleDistributionPage.description: Automate your wholesale distribution operations with intelligent AI agents. From purchase order automation to inventory optimization, ERP Agent transforms how distributors manage their ERP systems.
wholesaleDistributionPage.benefit1Desc: Automate repetitive ERP tasks like purchase order creation, product matching, and supplier communication.
wholesaleDistributionPage.benefit2Desc: Generate accurate sales quotes in minutes instead of hours with AI-powered product matching and pricing.
wholesaleDistributionPage.benefit3Desc: Cut purchasing and order processing time in half with intelligent automation tailored to your workflows.
wholesaleDistributionPage.featuresSubtitle: ERP Agent understands the unique challenges of wholesale distribution - from managing thousands of SKUs to coordinating with multiple suppliers.
wholesaleDistributionPage.feature1Desc: AI agents analyze sales velocity, inventory levels, and supplier lead times to automatically generate optimized purchase orders. Set your business rules and let the AI handle the rest.
wholesaleDistributionPage.feature2Desc: Upload customer RFQs in any format and get accurate quotes generated automatically. The AI matches products, applies customer-specific pricing, and formats professional quotes.
wholesaleDistributionPage.feature3Desc: Optimize inventory across multiple warehouse locations. AI analyzes demand patterns and stock levels to suggest and execute inter-warehouse transfers.
wholesaleDistributionPage.feature4Desc: Get real-time visibility into your distribution operations. AI-powered analytics surface actionable insights from your ERP data.
wholesaleDistributionPage.integrationsDesc: ERP Agent integrates with leading wholesale distribution ERP systems including Lemonsoft, NetSuite, SAP Business One, Microsoft Dynamics, and more.
